name: Aehr Test Systems
description: Aehr Test Systems is a leading provider of semiconductor test and burn-in equipment, primarily focused on the growing market for testing advanced semiconductor devices. Founded in 1977 and headquartered in Fremont, California, the company has established itself as a key player in the semiconductor industry. Aehr's innovative products are designed to increase the efficiency and effectiveness of testing, particularly for the automotive, consumer electronics, and telecommunications sectors. Their flagship products include the FOX systems, which are used for testing and burn-in of integrated circuits, specifically for memory and logic devices. As the demand for high-performance and reliable semiconductor devices continues to surge, especially in applications such as electric vehicles and Internet of Things (IoT) devices, Aehr is well-positioned to capitalize on these trends. The company is committed to providing advanced solutions that enhance device reliability and performance, thereby ensuring customer satisfaction in a competitive marketplace. Aehr Test Systems also emphasizes continuous innovation and improvement in its technologies to meet the evolving needs of its customers in the semiconductor space.
